name: Doom Vector
description:
Defend the planet from alien hords.

A clash between mid 2000's tower defence games and 1980's vector graphics. Strap in for a totaly new retro experience. 

Featuring:

Tower Defence

Wall building

First person turret controls

Story with a twist

A generic army general named Beverly

Idea and materials by MetricZero of http://bleedtimestudio.com/

Programed and designed by BlasterToad aka Jaden Drysdale

Music by Azureflux https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Azureflux

Inspired by Xeno Tactic and Battle Zone

Entry in game jam  https://itch.io/jam/shacknews-jam-v-the-final-frontier

03-03-2020: Added highlights to lvl 1 tutorial. Animated tutorial highlights.

03-04-2020: Stipped UE4 default plugins
